content: Monsieur D'Espilly, in the year 1772, calculated the population of France at upwards of 22 millions; namely, 10,562,631 males, and 11,451,726 females; consequently the proportion of females to males was about 14 to 13.
translations: ita:Monsieur D'Espilly stimò la popolazione della Francia a più di 22 milioni di persone; più precisamente, 10.562.631 masch
